alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 8:59PM PDT until October 30 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected in the calm valleys. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior, Northeastern Mendocino Interior and Southwestern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
